steps.description: Extract the stock price from the search results. Since the last search already gave the price, I will just find it using string matching.

tool_arguments.code:
search_results = """Found 5 search results:

1. Ather Energy Limited (ATHERENERG.NS) Stock Price, News, Quote & History ...
   URL: https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/ATHERENERG.NS/
   Summary: Find the latestAtherEnergyLimited (ATHERENERG.NS)stockquote, history, news and other vital information to help you with yourstocktrading and investing.

2. Ather Energy Limited Share Price Today, Stock Price, Live NSE News ...
   URL: https://www.nseindia.com/get-quotes/equity?symbol=ATHERENERG
   Summary: AtherEnergyLimited SharePriceToday, Live NSEStockPrice: Get the latestAtherEnergyLimited news, company updates, quotes, offers, annual financial reports, graph, volumes, 52 week high low, buy sell tips, balance sheet, historical charts, market performance, capitalisation, dividends, volume, profit and loss account, research, results and more details at NSE India.

3. Ather Energy Ltd. Share/Stock Price Live Today on NSE
   URL: https://www.etmoney.com/stocks/ather-energy-ltd/5043
   Summary: ATHERENERGStocksPrice- Know every detail aboutAtherEnergyLtd. performance, financials, technical, shareholding, risk ratios, corporate actions & news.

4. ATHERENERG Stock Price and Chart — NSE:ATHERENERG — TradingView
   URL: https://www.tradingview.com/symbols/NSE-ATHERENERG/
   Summary: View liveATHERENERGYLTD chart to track itsstock'spriceaction. Find market predictions, ATHERENERG financials and market news.

5. Ather Energy Ltd. Live Share Price, Stock Analysis and Price Estimates
   URL: https://trendlyne.com/equity/3080909/ATHERENERG/ather-energy-ltd/
   Summary: AtherEnergyLtd. (ATHERENERG) live sharepricetoday on NSE/BSE at 3:31 p.m. on May 7, 2025 is Rs 309.95. Explore financials, technicals, Deals, Corporate actions and more.
"""

import re
match = re.search(r'Rs (\d+\.?\d*)', search_results)
if match:
    stock_price = match.group(1)
    result = stock_price
else:
    result = "Could not find the stock price in the search results."

return result

perception.reasoning: The extracted value seems to be the stock price requested by the user. It seems like we achieved the final goal.
perception.local_reasoning: Extracted the stock price from the search results in previous turn.
perception.solution_summary: The latest stock price of Ather Energy is 309.95.
